column4: Hello, I've just installed compiz, but cannot activate it. What can be the problem?
I need to use the show mouse plugin.
- compiz is installed by default normally. whats yur video card. and you did install droivers for it?
whats your video card? system -> admmin -> addational drivers
I have installed it once, but it caused some problem, like the logo of ubuntu in boot time disappeared.
- the boot  plymouth issues are annoying but not critical.. you want compiz/eye candy? or a nice boot screen?
i disable plymouth.. i find it useless
for staters.. what is your chipset/viudeo card/
additional driver page says, the driver is tested by ubuntu developers..
if you want the compiz effects -0 you proberly need to use the drivers.. plymouthg issues are often fixable.
what IS the driver/chipset? nvidia? ati? intel?
http://i.imgur.com/5c9gI.png <-- This is what my additional driver page says.
so whats the point of uyour paste image?
nothing, just to let you know what it looks like.
